Description: Fragment of papyrus with demotic contract on front and back, starting with a regnal year date: Year 3 of Epiphanes (203/2 BC).
Curator's comments: To be published by Carol Andrews. Description: Andrews, Carol A. R., Eponymous Priests Old and New in Unpublished Fragmentary Demotic British Museum Papyri (P.BM EA 76271, 76269A, 10992 and 10540), in: Schneider, T. / Szpakowska, K. (ed.): Egyptian Stories. A British Egyptological Tribute to Alan B. Lloyd on the Occasion of his Retirement (Ägypten und Altes Testament 347), 2007, p. 1-11.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (115597) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/115597)
Associated names: Named in inscription: Ptolemy V Epiphanes (Year 3)
